description: Validation of an MD5 checksum on a File using md5sum
example: commandline 'md5sum -c manifest.md5', where manifest.md5 contains a MD5 checksum for a file called inputfile

inputs.description: Manifest file containing the MD5 and name of the file to be checked
inputs.name: manifest.md5

inputs.description: File that will be fixity checked
inputs.name: inputfile
